newsitem.title: JAPAN: Mitsui in deal with NBC to broadcast Japanese ads.
newsitem.headline: Mitsui in deal with NBC to broadcast Japanese ads.

text.p: Mitsui & Co Ltd said on Thursday it had agreed with National Broadcasting Corp (NBC) to become the U.S. broadcaster's representative in Japan in a project to broadcast Japanese companies' television commercials worldwide.
Under the agreement, NBC will air the commercials on its 24-hour news channel via satellite and cable in 75 countries and areas, a spokesman for the Japanese trading house said.
Several major Japanese companies, such as Toyota Motor Corp and NEC Corp, have already signed up, the spokesman said.
Mitsui will act as an agent for NBC in dealings with advertisers.
